name: raise an armada of rats to grow your ever expanding rat empire
name_original: raise an armada of rats to grow your ever expanding rat empire
description:
raise an armada of rats to grow your ever expanding rat empire is a game developed by Kroidi. It came out on 21-06-2020.
You can play raise an armada of rats to grow your ever expanding rat empire on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
